dct_title_s: An invitation and a guide to the Allegan, Michigan, area's streams, lakes, forests
dct_description_sm: Road map identical in appearance to 1950s-1960s maps issued by the Allegan County Road Commission.
Includes list: Your guide to major Allegan County lakes and streams.
On verso: Advertisements for local businesses, illustrations, and text: Welcome to Allegan lakes.
